item.description:
So.... you've been a member of this group and you've either:

A) Never made it out to meet up with us
B) Always had to cancel
C) Have come out a couple times, but not enough to make friends
D) Have come to every single event and are in love with us

For me, the answer is clearly D - and I want to share that experience with all of you lovely people. That's why I'm doing another "New Member Mixer" at Cambridge Common. We've been here before and really enjoyed ourselves last time. They have great beer samplers and yummy food. Peep it here.

I want to see new faces - do not be scared! We are a loving, awesome, fun, and fun-loving group of people who absolutely love to have a good time.

In other news: I'd love to get a few bucks from each of you guys towards the $75 membership fee for Meetup.com. Is it possible to get a $2-$5 donation from each of you when you come? I'd really appreciate it.
item.name: New (and Existing) Member Mixer
